Detailed Description

Driver for timing a variety of add implementations. Four separate add implementations are provided and they are all executed to compare their performance.

Author:
George Heineman
Date:
6/15/08

Timing as follows:

gettimeofday(&before, (struct timezone *) NULL); BEGIN OP HERE gettimeofday(&after, (struct timezone *) NULL); END

long usecs = diffTimer (&before, &after); SHOW RESULTS report (usecs);
